description: This is an HTML file that serves as the main frontend interface for a database viewer application. It contains the structure, styles, and client-side JavaScript code to browse databases, tables, and display table data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a particular database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables in a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders HTML table for given data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content if truncated.
